title: What is the law regarding handicap parking at Wrightsville Beach? Their signs indicate a fee for all parking. Thanks
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question.  http://www.myreporter.com/2012/09/do-drivers-of-cars-with-handicapped-designation-have-to-pay-parking-fees-in-wrightsville-beach/ Also: http://www.myreporter.com/2009/07/are-parking-tickets-forgiven-if-you-have-a-current-handicapped-sticker-or-plate/
